channel.title: Help (using mac)
channel.description:
I'm running of a macintosh and I just downloaded MoparScape.
I'm not what you call a "a+ computer student" so, I opened up the file, opened up the jar file, and it started loading simple enough. To create a server it said I had to start it by opening the runmoparscape file. My stuffit expander says that it can't open it. I go to the Linux file and it gives me a bunch of text.
Can anyone help me out?

item.title: Help (using mac)
item.dc:creator: @tom_d tom d
item.description:
@tom_d wrote:

i had the same problem you have to duplicate it and change the moparscape and runmoparscape and the copy’s of both into .jar then you double click on moparscape.jar and it should load after about 2mins , its get faster every time you open it though . hope i could help

-tom-

Read full topic

item.title: Help (using mac)
